name: Telangana Jagruthi
briefDescription: Our Mission:The mission of Telangana Jagruthi is to promote and preserve the unique cultural heritage of Telanganaand instill the people of Telangana a sense of pride of their culture, the promote economicindependence of disadvantaged children, youth and women by a network of support and the careerdevelopment tools to help them thrive in work and in life.Our Vision:Our vision is a world where Children, Youth and Women do not live in poverty. We strive for a worldwhere all women are financially independent, are treated with dignity and respect and are directlyimpacting their lives and those of their families. We aspire to a world that fully harnesses the power ofyouth and women and recognizes their role in economic sustainability.
